News.headline: Football At The Daggers On Boxing Day
News.page_title: Football At The Daggers On Boxing Day
News.URL_keywords: Football At The Daggers On Boxing Day
News.short_description: Come down to the Daggers on Bxoing day to enjoy Live Premier League action and special prices on a range of drinks at the bar
News.description:
The Daggers bar will show London derby between Watford and Crystal Palace on Sky Sports which kicks off at 12:30pm and Hull City's battle to get out of the relegation zone with their game against Manchester City. For people wishing to carry on the Christmas celebrations into Boxing day and to thank all our loyal supporters the Club will be slashing bar prices throughout the Club House from opening at 11.00am right through till 8.00pm. 

For this day only all draft beers and premium bottle beers will be just £2.50 a pint / bottle. A glass of wine just £2.00 and a half pint of draft lemonade or coca cola just 50p.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
